column2: food was highly overrated. Crunchy spicy tuna roll tasted the same as the ones you get from Whole Foods. Ok
column3: that may be an exaggeration but wanted to get my point across. First off
column4: the highlights would have to be the wagyu on hot rock
column5: and the karage chicken. The baby yellowtail was also good. Did not like the ham and eggs
column7: or anything else that we ordered. And we ordered A LOT. Spent $300 and left very unsatisfied in the quality of food and service (Dallas Uchi surpasses this location in both respects).
